actions.committee: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries.

official_title: A bill to increase the amount of benefits payable to windows of certain former employees of the Lighthouse Service.

summary.text: Increases the monthly benefit from $100 to $200 payable to widows of former employees of the Lighthouse Service who died from non-service-connected causes after fifteen years service or who were eligible for retirement benefits upon completion of such service.

titles.title: A bill to increase the amount of benefits payable to windows of certain former employees of the Lighthouse Service.
